column4: I am trying to Install Ubuntu 8.04 on my system which is a Q9550+ASUS P5Q Deluxe (P45) motherboard, 8GB RAM. It won't install. Any advice would be helpfull, and I would like to know if there are any known issues with the Intel P45 chipset. Thank you
Are you sure you've got the 64-bit version?
Hmm, how far do you get?
Is it a regular login prompt? Have you tried logging in as root?
